title: Wait, Nordstrom Is Having a Surprise Beauty Sale—I Can't Believe These 19 Favorites Are Discounted
author: Audry Hiaoui
text: When it comes to sales, nothing gets me more excited than a surprise selection of discounted beauty, especially when it's Nordstrom. The retailer quietly just launched a beauty sale, and it's so good.With up to 25% off select products through May 17, the sale includes everything from cult-favorite skincare to luxury fragrances you rarely see marked down. What truly took me by surprise the most was seeing Tom Ford perfumes included. FYI, a 1.7 oz bottle that's normally $405 is $300 right now…The rest of the roster is incredible as well, including beloved brands like True Botanicals, Malin+Goetz, Kiehl's, Bobby Brown, Sisley Paris, and Kate Somerville. Whether you're restocking trusted staples or treating yourself to something new, it's your chance to get them for less. TOM FORD Vanilla Sex Eau De Parfum I'm shocked at Tom Ford being on sale. True Botanicals Chebula Extreme Moisture Cream My mom loves natural skincare from True Botanicals. Sisley Paris Phyto-Teint Ultra Éclat Oil-Free Foundation Sisley Paris always catches my eye. MALIN+GOETZ Strawberry Reimagined Fragrance Set I've been curious about this strawberry line from Malin+Goetz. PURSONIC Bath and Body Care Bundle I like to dry brush before I shower. ghd Duet Blowdry 2-In-1 Hair Dryer Brush The easiest way to fake a professional blowout is to use a blow-dry brush. Blue Lagoon Iceland Lava Scrub Mask Maison Margiela Replica Warm & Spicy Travel Perfume Trio Set Travel-size Margiela perfumes. Kiehl's Since 1851 Rare Earth Deep Pore Cleansing Face Mask A boyfriend-favorite mask. Bobbi Brown Luxe Hydrating Lipstick PURSONIC Facial Steamer Hot Mist Moisturizing Spa Kiehl's Since 1851 Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask This overnight mask is extra hydrating from the squalane. Anastasia Beverly Hills Natural & Polished Deluxe Eyebrow Kit A best-selling brow gel from Anastasia Beverly Hills. Virtue Daily Damage Repair Essentials Set PURSONIC Ice Cube Facial Roller Massager I always wake up puffy and crave ice in the morning. Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Damage Defenders Set I've seen this Don't Despair, Repair! line by Briogeo all over TikTok. Kate Somerville Oil Free Moisturizer I trust Kate Somerville's products. PURSONIC Electric Heating Pad This thing saves me from everything from cold winters to stomach aches. When I tell you I don't know what I'd do without my heating pad, I mean it. PURSONIC Muscle Recovery & Relaxation Power Duo I've been wanting a massage gun.
html:
When it comes to sales, nothing gets me more excited than a surprise selection of discounted beauty, especially when it's Nordstrom. The retailer quietly just launched a beauty sale, and it's so good.

With up to 25% off select products through May 17, the sale includes everything from cult-favorite skincare to luxury fragrances you rarely see marked down. What truly took me by surprise the most was seeing Tom Ford perfumes included. FYI, a 1.7 oz bottle that's normally $405 is $300 right now…

The rest of the roster is incredible as well, including beloved brands like True Botanicals, Malin+Goetz, Kiehl's, Bobby Brown, Sisley Paris, and Kate Somerville. Whether you're restocking trusted staples or treating yourself to something new, it's your chance to get them for less.

TOM FORD

Vanilla Sex Eau De Parfum

I'm shocked at Tom Ford being on sale.

True Botanicals

Chebula Extreme Moisture Cream

My mom loves natural skincare from True Botanicals.

Sisley Paris

Phyto-Teint Ultra Éclat Oil-Free Foundation

Sisley Paris always catches my eye.

MALIN+GOETZ

Strawberry Reimagined Fragrance Set

I've been curious about this strawberry line from Malin+Goetz.

PURSONIC

Bath and Body Care Bundle

I like to dry brush before I shower.

ghd

Duet Blowdry 2-In-1 Hair Dryer Brush

The easiest way to fake a professional blowout is to use a blow-dry brush.

Blue Lagoon Iceland

Lava Scrub Mask

Maison Margiela

Replica Warm & Spicy Travel Perfume Trio Set

Travel-size Margiela perfumes.

A boyfriend-favorite mask.

Bobbi Brown

PURSONIC

Facial Steamer Hot Mist Moisturizing Spa

Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask

Anastasia Beverly Hills

A best-selling brow gel from Anastasia Beverly Hills.

Daily Damage Repair Essentials Set

Ice Cube Facial Roller Massager

I always wake up puffy and crave ice in the morning.

Briogeo

Don't Despair, Repair! Damage Defenders Set

I've seen this Don't Despair, Repair! line by Briogeo all over TikTok.

Kate Somerville

Oil Free Moisturizer

I trust Kate Somerville's products.

PURSONIC

Electric Heating Pad

This thing saves me from everything from cold winters to stomach aches. When I tell you I don't know what I'd do without my heating pad, I mean it.

PURSONIC

Muscle Recovery & Relaxation Power Duo

I've been wanting a massage gun.
